subject: Re: Removing decimal points
body:
On Fri, 2007-06-08 at 19:52 +0000, ash wrote:
> Hello there!
> 
> I need to remove decimal points from numbers. For eg 1.23 or 1.77
> would be just 1. Any suggestion is appreciated. Thank you.

$i = 1.77;
$j = int $i;
print $j;
